definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: You just type a few keys, “Happy birthday,” and you send that, and then you’re okay.
sentences.chinese: 只需要写“生日快乐”，然后发出去就可以了。

sentences.english: The postcard is from Hilde's father and wishes Hilde happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 明信片是由希尔德的父亲，并希望希尔德生日快乐。

sentences.english: Happy birthday, Tom, and many happy returns!
sentences.chinese: 生日快乐，汤姆，并祝你福如东海，寿比南山。

sentences.english: Happy birth day to you. Wish you healthy and gay forever.
sentences.chinese: 祝寒儒老师生日快乐，永远健康快乐。
生日快乐，我最亲爱的美女。

sentences.english: Her mother came over and wished Little Yun a happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈走过来，祝小云生日快乐。

sentences.english: Happy Birthday to you ar. Smart Hunter.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，仲有恺仍妹妹都祝你生日快乐。

sentences.english: Happy birthday to my knight Syaoran.
sentences.chinese: 先向我的骑士说声生日快乐。

sentences.english: A very happy birthday to Gianluca Pessotto, 36 today.
sentences.chinese: 佩索托，36岁生日快乐，一个非常高兴的生日。

sentences.english: No-one wished me a happy birthday.
I wish you a happy birthday, all the best, the right man.
sentences.chinese: 祝你生日快乐，事事如意，心想事成。

sentences.english: TO My Dear JJ LIN . Happy Birthday .
The light wishes my happy birthday, has the gift?
sentences.chinese: 光祝我生日快乐，有没有礼物啊？

sentences.english: Happy birthday to the best wife in the world.
sentences.chinese: 祝全世界最好的妻子生日快乐。

definition: to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
child whose birthday is being celebrated/birthday boy/birthday girl
give birth to a son soon (propitiatory compliment to the newly-weds)
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
may you live a long and happy life together (wedding greeting)
